    • Field Detail

      • LAST_REMOTELY_INITIALIZED_ENVIRONMENT_CLASS

        protected static java.lang.Class LAST_REMOTELY_INITIALIZED_ENVIRONMENT_CLASS
        For remotely running tests in a server, we want to track what environment was last initialized. That way we know if we need to transition to a different environment, or if no environment at all has ever been initialized.
